error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'speed_second_half' (value: 5) was used instead of 'days_second_half' (value: 50.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 30
Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=250>>250 pages.
Reading the first half took Jane 250 / 10 = <<250/10=25>>25 days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane 250 / 5 = <<250/5=50>>50 days.
So in total Jane needed 25 + 5 = <<25+5=30>>30 days to read the whole book.
